page.title: 12 Penpont Holiday Cottages
page.content: The{Penpont holiday complex}is located on the eastern edge of the village of {Amble}on a{182 hectare}farm which has been in the same family since{1908. The holiday cottage business was started in{1977}and there are now five people employed and{25 cottages}let year round. In an ordinary summer week the complex accommodates about{100 {people}plus all their{pets.}Most of the cottages have been converted from the barns and farm buildings which retain the original stone construction. A central feature, which was completed in{1985,}is the {recreation centre.}This very popular facility, catering easily for fifty people, includes a{sauna,}a{solarium, a 10m X 6m{heated indoor swimming {pool,}a{baby corner,}a{snooker table and a{jacuzzi.
